41824.name: Percentage of students in pre-primary education who are female (%)
41824.description: Total number of female students at the pre-primary level (ISCED 0.2) expressed as a percentage of the total number of students (male and female) at the pre-primary level in a given school year. Within ISCED 0, early childhood educational development programmes are targeted at children aged 0 to 2 years; and pre-primary education programmes are targeted at children aged 3 years until the age to start ISCED 1.
41824.datasetName: World Bank EdStats - Early Childhood Education
41824.s_name: World Bank EdStats: Percentage of students in pre-primary education who are female (%)

source.name: World Bank EdStats: Percentage of students in pre-primary education who are female (%)
